name: Black, White, and Blue
description:
Grayscale has drained everyone of their color. You are the last color left in the colorverse. Defeat his army and bring color back into the world!

In this game everything is black and white except you! Survive each level until the timer runs out and then move onto the next! Watch out for enemies and keep an eye on your health!

How to Play:

Move around with WASD or arrow keys, and shoot enemies with your mouse

Press ESC to pause the game

Shooting enemies will give you more health but be careful with your bullets because each shot costs 1 health.

Try to end the game with the highest score and lowest possible deaths

Screenshot your victory and challenge others to beat your score!
